description: Ministry of Labour and Labour Relations - Revocation of Order published in Gaz. Ex. No. 1739/15 of 04.01.2012 - Appointed Mr. T. Piyasoma as arbitrator for settle the dispute between Lanka Security Service Union and Mahaweli Authority of Sri Lanka - Appointed Mr. S. Kariyawasam as arbitrator for settle the dispute bewteen Inter Company Employees Union and Holcim (Lanka) Ltd. - Appointed Mrs. N. A. Jayawickrama as Arbitrator for settle the dispute between Mr. A. P. Mudannayaka and Sri Lanka Telecom PLC.
